name: Beryllus
description:
"Pandinus Dictator Trading Cards"

The series of works "Pandinus Dictator" is based on a customs seizure in Roissy of 119 scorpions of the protected species Pandinus Dictator, reputedly toxic and highly sought after by collectors. Coming from Cameroon, these live arachnids were intended to be sold via a Facebook page in the United States.
www.delieutraz.net/pandinus-dictator


Resolution: 1080x1080
Format: video .mp4
NTF copies: 3
Print copies : 500

Find printed copies at Avant Galerie Vossen, Paris
Courtesy of 22,48 m2

Photographs of scorpions made in collaboration with the Studio des Plantes
Scorpio pattern in collaboration with Olivier Kimyon
